querys.VolumenesNoOficialesVenta: SELECT Employees.Country, Employees.LastName, Employees.FirstName, Orders.ShippedDate, Orders.OrderID, "Order Subtotals".Subtotal AS SaleAmount FROM Employees INNER JOIN (Orders INNER JOIN "Order Subtotals" ON Orders.OrderID = "Order Subtotals".OrderID) ON Employees.EmployeeID = Orders.EmployeeID WHERE Orders.ShippedDate Between @fechaini And @fechafin
querys.Compras: SELECT Employees.Country, Employees.LastName, Employees.FirstName, Orders.ShippedDate, Orders.OrderID, "Order Subtotals".Subtotal AS SaleAmount FROM Employees INNER JOIN (Orders INNER JOIN "Order Subtotals" ON Orders.OrderID = "Order Subtotals".OrderID) ON Employees.EmployeeID = Orders.EmployeeID WHERE Employees.LastName IN ([FECHAS])
querys.Ventas: SELECT Employees.Country, Employees.LastName, Employees.FirstName, Orders.ShippedDate, Orders.OrderID, "Order Subtotals".Subtotal AS SaleAmount FROM Employees INNER JOIN (Orders INNER JOIN "Order Subtotals" ON Orders.OrderID = "Order Subtotals".OrderID) ON Employees.EmployeeID = Orders.EmployeeID WHERE Orders.OrderID IN ([FECHAS])
querys.Otros: SELECT Employees.Country, Employees.LastName, Employees.FirstName, Orders.ShippedDate, Orders.OrderID, "Order Subtotals".Subtotal AS SaleAmount FROM Employees INNER JOIN (Orders INNER JOIN "Order Subtotals" ON Orders.OrderID = "Order Subtotals".OrderID) ON Employees.EmployeeID = Orders.EmployeeID WHERE Employees.LastName IN ([FECHAS]) AND Orders.ShippedDate = @Fecha
